Mexico tomato growers have used govt subsidies to flood US market in effort to wipe out #Florida growers. Have worked with the US trade rep over last 2 years to fix this. 

As for prices if Florida growers get wiped out Mexico can charge whatever they want https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2019/03/21/an-uneasy-tomato-truce-between-florida-mexico-is-coming-bitter-end/

Last year, I woke up to organize w/ my community & waitressed to make ends meet. Today, staggeringly, I woke up to this.

I believe in an America where all things are possible. Where a basic, dignified life isn’t a dream, but a norm. 

That’s why I got up then,& why I get up now. https://twitter.com/time/status/1108709241781661696 QT @TIME TIME’s new cover: “Change is closer than we think.” Inside Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez’s unlikely rise http://time.com/longform/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-profile/?utm_source=twitter.com&xid=time_socialflow_twitter&utm_medium=socialflowtw&utm_campaign=time http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1108708973799243781/img/BJ6wyM6yeeiqr1EV.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1108708973799243781/vid/320x426/G_E7ZL16XH-FBGTV.mp4?tag=11

https://twitter.com/NYTScience/status/1108372337743806466 QT @NYTScience No woman has won the Abel — the Nobel Prize of mathematics. Until this week. https://trib.al/Z3BJxsX

Aretha Franklin was a legend. I'll never forget hearing the Queen sing how lucky I was to be 'Young, Gifted and Black.’ We should honor Aretha's artistic & cultural contributions by awarding her the Congressional Gold Medal. #WomensHistoryMonth

When we choose NOT to establish healthcare as a right (including mental health!) it spills over + compounds the costs of homelessness, mass incarceration, & police confrontation.

None of these issues would be as dire or costly if we prioritized mental health in policy + culture. https://twitter.com/madinatoure/status/1108899798378270720 QT @madinatoure “Calls to 911 reporting what the NYPD terms EDPs — ‘emotionally disturbed persons’ — have nearly doubled over the last decade, rising every year and in every precinct.” http://nymag.com/intelligencer/amp/2019/03/special-report-nypds-mental-illness-response-breakdown.html

He is like a barren bush in the wasteland that enjoys no change of season,But stands in lava beds in the wilderness, a land, salty and uninhabited.

Jeremiah 17: 5-6

We should support #Israel sovereignty over #Golan.

#Assad allows #Iran & #Hezbollah to operate with impunity in southern #Syria. If Assad got ahold of Golan they would operate against Israel from there too. 

Israel needs that buffer to be permanent.

I applaud @realDonaldTrump for taking the long overdue step of recognizing Israel’s sovereignty over the Golan Heights. It’s an enormously important signal that we stand with our allies and against our enemies, and will be heard by both. https://twitter.com/realdonaldtrump/status/1108772952814899200 QT @realDonaldTrump After 52 years it is time for the United States to fully recognize Israel’s Sovereignty over the Golan Heights, which is of critical strategic and security importance to the State of Israel and Regional Stability!

@SenTomCotton, @RepGallagher & I applaud @realDonaldTrump for formally recognizing Israel’s sovereignty over the Golan Heights, an acknowledgement that enhances the national security of both Israel and the United States. —> https://www.cruz.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=4387
